items.content_html: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: #Virtual Assistant Using #Jarvis A web-based assistant built with #HTML, #CSS, and #JavaScript. It uses #WebSpeechAPI for voice recognition and text-to-speech, enabling features like voice commands, task handling, and dynamic responses. Lightweight, fully browser-based, and perfect for exploring interactive front-end development.

Lightweight, fully browser-based, and perfect for exploring interactive front-end development.

items.content_html: AnyGridJS is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
